title: ''Your account is always your responsibility''
body:
While ago i received this E-mail from riot :--
http://pasteboard.co/9UtTuuGJV.png i logged into a cool website that looked like a new project from riot and had a login screen animation after logging in nothing happened and i got no gifts but after this i noticed games played on my account that i didnt i went ahead and changed my E-mail/password for my league's account and after doing it everything gone right but suddenly i got perma-banned for ''AccountSelling/Botting'' as the riot suppport told me that I USED BOTTING TILL LVL 30 and then sold it ...
when i did not i kept receiving E-mails from Riot to login more and more but i didnt i even recieved it on my new E-mail...
so what i can understand now is that __there is a Rioter hating me so he sent me those links to crack my account and use 3rd party apps on it_
and then support is saying ''**Your account is always your responsibility**''...
Well the only thing i want to do because i cant get it is to tell the Rioter : WD You got my account perma-banned Gz :)
Note:the rioters received my ticket didnt care of it nor they checked the screenshots they onl read the title

replies.body: What is your ticket number?  I'd be happy to take a look.  It sounds like a pretty unfortunate circumstance, and we're happy to assist players with account recovery after a phishing situation like.  It's important that you go through our[ Emails From Riot ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751784-Emails-from-Riot-Games)guide to know which addresses we use to reach out to players, and that it's unlikely we would offer promotions in an email like that.  It's also true that account security is something that everyone should take as important, and security is in fact your responsibility.  Let me know!

thank you for your effort :),
anyway after sending more than 7 tickets to prove they i get the same answer that they cannot remove the ban because  its all against terms of use and my account is my own responsibility ...
is there anything i can do??!

#22955860 and #22864217 and i have more screenshots for other e-mails that rioter sent :)
.
and thank you for getting me the link i will read it ...bu i wish i seen it earlier
Thanks anyway for caring to Matter{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}

Thanks!  I looked into this for you, but due to the nature of sensitive account information there's not much I can share here on the boards.   I do see you have another ticket open, so more context can be provided there from our specialists.  Best of luck!

ok i just wanted to know if you are going to punish the Rioter who sent me the e-mails / if there is a chance to get my account back ...
and after checking the link i see the Domain that sent me the E-mail is Vaild
and again thank you for giving vare to my post :) 
Goodluck

A rioter did not send you that email.  You received a [phishing email ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account#h2q2)which is something that emulates official communications in order to falsify information and compromise your account security.   While you may have been a victim of phishing back in September of last year, the response you received in your ticket is not related to that.  Continue speaking with your specialist after you receive a response in your ticket for any clarification that you need.

but why cant you handle it ....i see you are A support specialist 
in similar cases would you try to give a chance ??
and what if my specialist is lazy/busy and wont check screenshots or only read my title ...
i also received the same e-mail many times ....the last time was in july i guess
Why does league of legends, the biggest online game in the world not have any kind of added security measures?
